Pre-Game Insights: West Indies start marginal favourites as they will benefit from the home conditions and also have a more destructive batting unit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brian Lara Stadium at Tarouba in Trinidad has hosted 9 T20Is with the team batting first coming out victorious in 4 of these encounters.
The average team total batting first at the venue is 128 while the average score chasing is 112.

England blasted 267 for 3 against the West Indies at Tarouba in December, 2023 which is the highest team total in a contest between two major Test playing nations in T20I cricket and the fifth-highest overall.
Others: South Africa and West Indies have faced each other in 23 T20Is and the Proteas have a marginal edge with a 12-11 head to head record.
However, West Indies have won four of the last 5 encounters between the two teams.
